feature_name: Entering minutes for an Annual General Meeting

user_story.i_want: enter minutes for the Annual General Meeting
user_story.so_that: keep records of the business transacted at the Annual General Meeting

givens_list: there has been a past AGM
no minutes for the past AGM have been entered yet
whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I follow "Enter minutes for this meeting" for the past AGM
I enter minutes for the AGM
I choose the Members who were in attendance
I press "Save these minutes"
I follow "View minutes" for the AGM
thens_list: I should see "Minutes have not been entered for this meeting yet" for the past AGM
I should see a field for each of the standard agenda items
I should be on the Meetings page
I should see the minutes I entered
I should see the participants I chose

whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I follow "Enter minutes for a meeting not shown here"
I choose "Annual General Meeting" from the list of meeting types
I enter the date of the meeting
I enter minutes for the meeting
I choose the Members who were in attendance
I press "Save these minutes"
I follow "View minutes" for the AGM
thens_list: I should be on the Meetings page
I should see the AGM in the list of Past Meetings
I should see the minutes I entered

givens_list: there has been a past AGM
the AGM has no minutes yet
there were resolutions attached to the AGM
whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I follow "Enter minutes for this meeting" for the past AGM
I enter that all the resolutions were passed
I enter other minutes for the meeting
I choose the Members who were in attendance
I press "Save these minutes"
I go to the Proposals page
I open the "Outcomes" tab
thens_list: I should see a list of the resolutions attached to the meeting
I should see the resolutions marked as passed
